title: Differentiator: Professional Services
content: Commonly, data analytics solutions are delivered with a heavy professional services requirement. The typical installation and subsequent configuration can take months of work to realize even the most basic value. Downward pricing pressure on the type of professional services used in data analytics installations is common and becoming more intense due to the mundane and low-value type of work and skill sets required to complete the busywork of mapping source data to the data analytics tools used. Current, rates are usually set in the $120-per-hour range for data analytics setup and maintenance.
